1:
Yahweh our Lord, people all over the world know that you are very great!\q2 We see your greatness every time we look toward the heavens!
\q1
2:
You have taught little children and infants to praise you;\q2 they cause your enemies and those who try to get revenge on you to be silent.


\q1
3:
I look up at the sky at night\q2 and see the things that you have made—
\q2 the moon and the stars that you have set in place.
\q1
4:
It is amazing to me that you think about people,\q2 that you are concerned about us humans!
\q1
5:
You made the angels in heaven to be only a little more important than we are;\q2 you caused us to be like kings!


\q1
6:
You put us in charge of everything that you made;\q2 you gave us authority over all things—
\q1
7:
the sheep and the cattle,\q2 and even the wild animals,
\q1
8:
the birds, the fish,\q2 and everything else that swims in the seas.


\q1
9: Yahweh our Lord,\q2 people all over the world know that you are very great!
